Initialize Full Pipeline Script and Model Script

init.Rd

This function creates a full pipeline R script and a model C++ script, saving them to the appropriate folders within the project directory structure. The folder structure is created using `AgePopDenom::create_project_structure()`. The R script is automatically opened in RStudio after creation.

Usage

init(
  r_script_name = "full_pipeline.R",
  cpp_script_name = "model.cpp",
  path = here::here(),
  open_r_script = TRUE,
  setup_rscript = TRUE
)

Arguments

r_script_name

Character. The name of the R script file to be created. Defaults to `"full_pipeline.R"`.

cpp_script_name

Character. The name of the C++ script file to be created. Defaults to `"model.cpp"`.

path

Character. The directory in which to create the scripts. Defaults to `"."`.

open_r_script

Logical. Whether to open the R script automatically in RStudio (if available). Defaults to `TRUE`.

setup_rscript

Logical. Whether to setup the R script with example code. Defaults to `TRUE`.

Value

A list of character strings with the file paths of the created scripts. The function also generates success messages upon completion.

Examples

# Create the full pipeline script and model script
# init()
